doc.title: Wingman - Courage & Loyalty
doc.plot: A young man is the perennial Wingman for his bros, selflessly falling on the grenade so his friends can meet the girls of their dreams, leaving him with their undesirable sidekicks time and time again. When the Wingman falls in love, but falls short of getting the girl of his dreams, it leaves the entire crew is disarray. The Wingman's friends realize his plight and rally to help him get her back.
